derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English cresse, cærse, of West Germanic origin; related to Dutch kers and German Kresse

entry.tran: 水芹(常用在色拉中或作饰菜)
entry.def: Cress is a plant with small green leaves that are used in salads or to decorate food.
Watercress is sometimes referred to as cress .

means.word_mean: 1. any of various plants of the family Cruciferae having edible pungent-tasting leaves
2. pungent leaves of any of numerous cruciferous herbs
